project.name: Apache OpenEJB
project.description: Apache OpenEJB is an open source, modular, configurable and extensible EJB Container System and EJB Server.

doapOptions.description: Apache TomEE Web Profile delivers Servlets, JSP, JSF, JTA, JPA, CDI, Bean Validation and EJB Lite. Apache TomEE Plus has all the features of TomEE with the addition of JAX-RS (RESTfull Services), JAX-WS (Web Services), JMS (Java Message Service) and JCA (the Java Connector Architecture). The additional functionality is delivered via Apache CXF, Apache ActiveMQ and the Geronimo Connector library
doapOptions.name: Apache TomEE
doapOptions.shortdesc: Apache TomEE is an all-Apache Java EE 6 Web Profile stack for Apache Tomcat

asfExtOptions.charter: Apache TomEE provides an all-Apache Java EE 6 Web Profile stack for Apache Tomcat
asfExtOptions.name: Apache TomEE

pluginRepository.name: Apache Software Foundation M2 Snapshot Repository
